metadata.description: This data was derived from "1: 100,000 Land Use Data of China". Based on Landsat MSS, TM and ETM remote sensing data, 1: 100,000 Land Use Data of China was compiled within three years by a remote sensing scientific and technological team of 19 research institutes affiliated to the Chinese Academy of Sciences, which was organized by the “Remote Sensing Macroinvestigation and Dynamic Research on the National Resources and Environment", one of the major application programs in Chinese Academy of Sciences during the "Eighth Five-year Plan". This data adopts a hierarchical land cover classification system, which divides the country into 6 first-class categories (cultivated land, forest land, grassland, water area, urban and rural areas, industrial and mining areas, residential land and unused land) and 31 second-class categories. This is the most accurate land use data product in our country at present. It has already played an important role in national land resources survey, hydrology and ecological research.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据来源于“中国1:10万土地利用数据”。中国1:10万土地利用数据是由中国科学院“八五”重大应用项目《全国资源环境遥感宏观调查与动态研究》组织了中国科学院所属19个研究所的遥感科技队伍，以卫星遥感为手段，在三年内基于Landsat MSS，TM和ETM遥感数据构建的。本数据采用一个分层的土地覆盖分类系统，将全国分为6个一级类（耕地、林地、草地、水域、城乡、工矿、居民用地和未利用土地），31个二级类。这是目前我国精度最高的土地利用数据产品，已经在国家土地资源调查、水文、生态研究中发挥着重要作用。

background: Land-use/cover change has become an event being of paramount importance to the study of global environmental change. Land-cover change is closely related to the terrestrial surface material cycles and life-support processes, i.e., the interaction between biosphere and atmosphere, biodiversity, biogeochemical cycle and sustainable exploitation of resources. The series of scientific study programs, issued and promoted by IGBP and IHDP in 1995, make the study of land-use and land-cover change (LUCC) become one of the hot topics in the global environmental change study. As a developing but booming country, China has formulated a series of policies exerting great influence on the land-use change. In addition, due to varied physical environments and vast land areas, its land-use changes not only influence the social and economic development but also impact the global change accordingly.
research objective: In this paper, the division of dynamic regionalization of land-use change is designed, for the sake of revealing the temporal and spatial features of land-use change and laying the foundation for the study of regional scale land-use changes. The paper exerts an effective effort on the integrated studies of “spatial pattern” and “temporal process” for land-use change to reveal the regional land-use change characteristics on the pattern of dynamic process and dynamic process of pattern.
challenges: It is too early to say that the trend of deforestation has been effectively reversed across China. There also exist conspicuous conflicts between arable land protection and urban expansion, as showed in the irrational conversion from arable land to built-up areas.
dataset: The main data sources are Landsat TM digital images (520 scenes in 1995/1996 and 508 scenes in 1999/2000). Apart from that, the CBERS-1 (China-Brazil Earth Resources Satellite 1) data were also used to acquire land-use information for 1999/2000.
findings: There exists conspicuous regional differentiation of land-use change in China, which lays the foundation to draw the dynamic zones. The rapid change of land-use change during 1995—2000 happened in North China, Loess Plateau—agricultural and pasturing interlaced area, Northeast China, southeast coastal region, middle and lower reaches of Yangtze River, eastern coastal region.
backgroundCn: 土地利用/覆盖变化已成为全球环境变化研究中至关重要的事件。土地覆盖变化与陆地表面物质循环和生命支持过程密切相关，即生物圈与大气、 biodiversity、生物地球化学循环以及资源的可持续开发之间的相互作用。1995年，国际全球变化研究计划（IGBP）和国际人文与社会科学计划（IHDP）发布并推动的一系列科学研究项目，使得土地利用和土地覆盖变化（LUCC）的研究成为全球环境变化研究的热门话题。作为一个发展中但蓬勃发展的国家，中国制定了一系列对土地利用变化产生重大影响的政策。此外，由于物理环境的多样性和广阔的土地面积，其土地利用变化不仅影响社会和经济发展，还对全球变化产生相应的影响。
research objectiveCn: 在本文中，土地利用变化的动态区域划分旨在揭示土地利用变化的时间和空间特征，并为区域尺度土地利用变化的研究奠定基础。本文有效地致力于“空间格局”和“时间过程”综合研究，以揭示区域土地利用变化特征在动态过程的格局和动态过程的格局上的表现。
challengesCn: 目前还为时尚早，无法说中国的森林砍伐趋势已经有效逆转。同时，耕地保护与城市扩张之间存在明显的冲突，表现为耕地向建设用地的不合理转化。
datasetCn: 主要数据来源是Landsat TM数字图像（1995/1996年的520幅场景和1999/2000年的508幅场景）。此外，还使用了CBERS-1（中巴地球资源卫星1号）数据，以获取1999/2000年的土地利用信息。
findingsCn: 中国的土地利用变化存在明显的区域差异，这为划分动态区域奠定了基础。在1995年至2000年期间，北方地区、黄土高原—农业与牧业交错区、东北地区、东南沿海地区、长江中下游地区以及东部沿海地区的土地利用变化迅速。

background: Land cover plays a significant role in Earth system science, which reflects the influence of human activities and environmental changes. Reliable and up-to-date land cover data are very important for land, ecological and hydrological modelling, carbon and water cycle study as well as global climatic change study. Many land use/cover maps at global, continental, and regional scales have been produced in recent years using remote sensing. These four global land cover maps are all derived from remote sensing data and created for the same fundamental purpose of providing improved land cover information for scientific studies and environmental monitoring, but they are different in mapping methods, data sources, and classification systems.
research objective: The objective of this paper is to evaluate the application of the four popular land cover maps over China land mass. The possibility of developing a new land cover map whose classification is compatible with a well-accepted legend system but whose accuracy is more reliable also motivates this study.
challenges: The four maps used different classification systems, which made the comparison difficult. We conclude that the accuracies of all the datasets cannot meet the requirements of land surface modelling. For the reference data, i.e. the 1:100 000 land cover map, the classification system needs to be transferred to a well-recognized one that has been used commonly in land surface modelling.
methods: We compare and evaluate four land cover datasets over China. So we first aggregated these maps by reclassifying them using a unified legend system. A large-scale, i.e. 1:100 000 land cover map of China was used as the reference data to validate the four maps.
dataset: The datasets include the Version 2 global land cover dataset of IGBP, MODIS land cover map 2001, a global land cover map produced by the University of Maryland, and the land cover map produced by the global land cover for the year 2000 (GLC 2000) project coordinated by the Global Vegetation Monitoring Unit of the European Commission Joint Research Centre. The large-scale (1:100 000) land use map of China in 2000, which was produced by Chinese Academy of Science to meet large-scale resource survey and land use mapping, was used as truth to validate the four land cover maps over China.
findings: The results show that the GLC2000 land cover map represents the highest accuracy. The MODIS land cover map ranks second for type area consistency and third for sub-fraction overall accuracy compared with reference data. The IGBP land cover map has good labelling accuracy, although it has a local labelling error and third consistency for type area. The labelling accuracy and type area consistency for the reference data of UMd land cover map is low.
backgroundCn: 土地覆盖在地球系统科学中发挥着重要作用，反映了人类活动和环境变化的影响。可靠和最新的土地覆盖数据对于土地、生态和水文建模、碳和水循环研究以及全球气候变化研究非常重要。近年来，许多全球、洲际和区域尺度的土地利用/覆盖图是利用遥感技术制作的。这四个全球土地覆盖图都是基于遥感数据生成的，旨在为科学研究和环境监测提供改进的土地覆盖信息，但它们在制图方法、数据来源和分类系统上有所不同。
research objectiveCn: 本文的目的是评估四种流行的中国土地覆盖图的应用。开发一幅与公认的分类系统兼容但准确性更可靠的新土地覆盖图的可能性也激励了本研究。
challengesCn: 这四个地图使用了不同的分类系统，这使得比较变得困难。我们得出结论，所有数据集的准确性都无法满足地表建模的要求。对于参考数据，即1:100,000的土地覆盖图，分类系统需要转化为一个在地表建模中常用的公认系统。
methodsCn: 我们对中国的四个土地覆盖数据集进行了比较和评估。首先，我们通过使用统一的图例系统对这些地图进行了重新分类。我们使用了一幅大比例尺（1:100,000）的中国土地覆盖图作为参考数据来验证这四个地图。
datasetCn: 数据集包括IGBP的版本2全球土地覆盖数据集、2001年MODIS土地覆盖图、由马里兰大学制作的全球土地覆盖图，以及由欧洲委员会联合研究中心全球植被监测单位协调的2000年全球土地覆盖图（GLC 2000）项目制作的土地覆盖图。2000年中国的大比例尺（1:100,000）土地利用图是由中国科学院制作的，旨在满足大规模资源调查和土地利用制图的需求，作为验证这四个土地覆盖图在中国的真实情况。
findingsCn: 结果显示，GLC2000土地覆盖图的准确性最高。MODIS土地覆盖图在类型面积一致性方面排名第二，在与参考数据相比的子分数整体准确性方面排名第三。IGBP土地覆盖图具有良好的标记准确性，尽管存在局部标记错误，并且在类型面积一致性方面排名第三。UMd土地覆盖图的参考数据的标记准确性和类型面积一致性较低。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a dataset that utilizes remote sensing technology to classify land use types in China?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个利用遥感技术对中国土地利用类型进行分类的数据集示例？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a dataset that utilizes remote sensing technology is the Shaanxi Province 1:100,000 Land Use Dataset (2000), which is based on Landsat MSS, TM, and ETM remote sensing data. This dataset employs a hierarchical land cover classification system to categorize land into six primary types and 31 secondary types.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个利用遥感技术的数据集是陕西省1:100,000土地利用数据集（2000年），该数据集基于Landsat MSS、TM和ETM遥感数据。该数据集采用分层土地覆盖分类系统，将土地分为六种主要类型和31种次要类型。

Example.QuestionEn: Please provide an example of a challenge faced when comparing different land cover datasets in China.
Example.QuestionCn: 请提供一个在比较中国不同土地覆盖数据集时面临的挑战的例子。
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a challenge is the difficulty in comparing different land cover datasets due to the use of varying classification systems. This issue was highlighted in the evaluation of four popular land cover maps over China, where the need to convert classification systems to a well-recognized one for land surface modeling was identified.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个挑战的例子是由于使用不同的分类系统而导致比较不同土地覆盖数据集的困难。这个问题在对中国四个流行土地覆盖地图的评估中得到了强调，指出需要将分类系统转换为一个公认的系统，以便进行地表建模。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the main features of land-use classification systems used in data collection within the context of land-use change studies?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在土地利用变化研究中用于数据收集的土地利用分类系统的主要特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: hierarchical approach, primary categories, secondary classifications
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 分层方法，主要类别，次要分类

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What specific challenges are associated with harmonizing different land cover datasets for use in ecological and hydrological modeling?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在生态和水文模型中协调不同土地覆盖数据集使用时有哪些具体挑战？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: variability in classification systems, accuracy of datasets, conversion of classification systems to a unified legend
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 分类系统的可变性、数据集的准确性、分类系统向统一图例的转换

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many scenes of Landsat TM digital images were used in the land-use dataset for 1995/1996 and 1999/2000?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 1995/1996年和1999/2000年的土地利用数据集使用了多少幅Landsat TM数字图像场景？

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many primary and secondary land cover categories are included in the hierarchical classification system used in the 1:100,000 land use map of China?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在中国1:100,000土地利用地图中使用的分层分类系统中，包括多少个主要和次要土地覆盖类别？

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many global land cover datasets were evaluated against the 1:100,000 land use map of China for accuracy and consistency?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 有多少个全球土地覆盖数据集与中国1:100,000土地利用地图进行了准确性和一致性的评估？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the significance of a 'land-use/cover change' dataset in environmental studies?
Definition.QuestionCn: “土地利用/覆盖变化”数据集在环境研究中的重要性是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: Land-use/cover change datasets are crucial for studying global environmental changes as they are closely related to terrestrial surface material cycles, life-support processes, and the interaction between the biosphere and atmosphere. They help in understanding biodiversity, biogeochemical cycles, and the sustainable exploitation of resources.
Definition.AnswerCn: 土地利用/覆盖变化数据集对于研究全球环境变化至关重要，因为它们与陆地表面物质循环、生命支持过程以及生物圈与大气之间的相互作用密切相关。它们有助于理解生物多样性、生物地球化学循环以及资源的可持续开发。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the data collection methods used in acquiring Landsat TM digital images compare to those used for CBERS-1 data in terms of their application for land-use information acquisition?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 获取Landsat TM数字图像的数据收集方法与CBERS-1数据的数据收集方法在土地利用信息获取的应用方面有何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Both Landsat TM and CBERS-1 data are utilized to acquire land-use information, but they may differ in terms of resolution, spectral bands, and temporal coverage, which could affect their application in accurately capturing land-use changes. The metadata suggests Landsat TM images are specifically used for the period 1995/1996 and 1999/2000, while CBERS-1 data is noted for 1999/2000.
Comparison.AnswerCn: Landsat TM 和 CBERS-1 数据都被用于获取土地利用信息，但它们在分辨率、光谱波段和时间覆盖方面可能存在差异，这可能会影响它们在准确捕捉土地利用变化方面的应用。元数据表明，Landsat TM 图像特别用于1995/1996年和1999/2000年，而CBERS-1 数据则记录于1999/2000年。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What can the use of remote sensing data tell us about the effectiveness of land cover classification systems in capturing diverse land-use changes?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 使用遥感数据可以告诉我们有关土地覆盖分类系统在捕捉多样化土地利用变化方面的有效性吗？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Remote sensing data used in land cover classification systems, such as those derived from Landsat and CBERS-1, can provide insights into how accurately these systems represent diverse land-use changes. By comparing different classification systems, researchers can evaluate the reliability of land cover maps and assess their ability to capture temporal and spatial variations in land-use change across different regions.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 遥感数据用于土地覆盖分类系统，例如来自Landsat和CBERS-1的数据，可以提供关于这些系统如何准确表示多样化土地利用变化的见解。通过比较不同的分类系统，研究人员可以评估土地覆盖图的可靠性，并评估它们在不同地区捕捉土地利用变化的时间和空间变化的能力。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How can challenges in classification system compatibility impact the interpretation of land-use data across various datasets?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 分类系统兼容性的问题如何影响不同数据集之间土地利用数据的解读？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Differences in classification systems among land cover datasets, such as those used by IGBP, MODIS, University of Maryland, and GLC 2000, can complicate the comparison and interpretation of land-use data. These challenges necessitate reclassification to a common legend system to ensure accurate comparisons and assessments, impacting the ability to derive consistent and reliable interpretations of land-use changes.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 不同的土地覆盖数据集（如IGBP、MODIS、马里兰大学和GLC 2000）之间的分类系统差异可能会使土地利用数据的比较和解释变得复杂。这些挑战需要将数据重新分类为一个共同的图例系统，以确保准确的比较和评估，从而影响对土地利用变化的可靠和一致的解释能力。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What implications do regional variations in land-use changes have on the development of dynamic regionalization models?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 区域土地利用变化的区域差异对动态区域化模型的发展有什么影响？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Regional variations in land-use changes, particularly those observed in areas like North China, Loess Plateau, and southeast coastal regions, highlight the need for dynamic regionalization models that can account for these differences. Such models can reveal the temporal and spatial features of land-use change and provide a foundation for studying regional-scale dynamics, aiding in the understanding of land-use patterns and informing policy decisions.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 土地利用变化的区域差异，特别是在华北、黄土高原和东南沿海地区的变化，突显了需要动态区域化模型来考虑这些差异。这些模型可以揭示土地利用变化的时间和空间特征，为研究区域尺度的动态提供基础，帮助理解土地利用模式并为政策决策提供信息。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes the challenges in comparing different land cover datasets over China, and how might these challenges affect the accuracy of land surface modelling?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在比较中国不同土地覆盖数据集时，存在哪些挑战，这些挑战可能如何影响地表模型的准确性？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The challenges in comparing different land cover datasets arise from the use of different classification systems by each map, which makes direct comparison difficult. This inconsistency can lead to inaccuracies in land surface modelling, as the classification system needs to be unified to improve reliability.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 比较不同土地覆盖数据集的挑战在于每个地图使用了不同的分类系统，这使得直接比较变得困难。这种不一致可能导致土地表面建模中的不准确，因为需要统一分类系统以提高可靠性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why might there be a conspicuous regional differentiation of land-use change in China, and how does this impact the understanding of dynamic zones?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么中国的土地利用变化可能存在明显的区域差异，这如何影响对动态区域的理解？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Regional differentiation of land-use change in China could be caused by varied physical environments and different rates of development across regions. This differentiation impacts the understanding of dynamic zones by highlighting areas with rapid changes, which can inform targeted studies and policy interventions.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 中国土地利用变化的区域差异可能是由于不同的自然环境和各地区发展速度的差异。这种差异化影响了对动态区域的理解，突显了快速变化的区域，这可以为针对性的研究和政策干预提供信息。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the underlying reasons for the conflicts between arable land protection and urban expansion in China, and how do these conflicts manifest in land-use data?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 中国耕地保护与城市扩张之间冲突的根本原因是什么，这些冲突在土地利用数据中如何表现？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The conflicts between arable land protection and urban expansion are driven by the need for urban development at the expense of agricultural land. These conflicts manifest in land-use data as irrational conversions from arable land to built-up areas, indicating challenges in balancing development and resource conservation.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 耕地保护与城市扩张之间的冲突是由城市发展对农业用地的需求驱动的。这些冲突在土地利用数据中表现为耕地向建筑用地的不合理转变，表明在发展与资源保护之间平衡面临挑战。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of using Landsat satellite data combined with CBERS-1 data for land-use information collection over a specific period?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用Landsat卫星数据与CBERS-1数据结合进行特定时期的土地利用信息收集的潜在后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The integration of Landsat satellite data with CBERS-1 data allows for comprehensive land-use information collection, providing regional differentiation of land-use change and laying a foundation for creating dynamic zones. This approach can reveal rapid land-use changes in specific areas, such as North China and the Loess Plateau, during a given timeframe.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 将Landsat卫星数据与CBERS-1数据相结合，可以全面收集土地利用信息，提供土地利用变化的区域差异，为创建动态区域奠定基础。这种方法可以揭示特定区域（如华北和黄土高原）在特定时间段内的快速土地利用变化。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How might the diversity in classification systems among different land cover datasets affect their use in land surface modelling?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 不同土地覆盖数据集之间分类系统的多样性可能会如何影响它们在地表建模中的使用？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The diversity in classification systems poses challenges for direct comparisons and can lead to inaccuracies in land surface modelling. Reclassification using a unified legend system is necessary to ensure compatibility and improve the accuracy of these datasets for modelling purposes.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 分类系统的多样性给直接比较带来了挑战，并可能导致土地表面建模中的不准确性。使用统一的图例系统进行重新分类是必要的，以确保数据集的兼容性并提高这些数据集在建模目的上的准确性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What objective does the division of dynamic regionalization of land-use change serve in the context of studying temporal and spatial features of land use?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 动态区域化土地利用变化的划分在研究土地利用的时间和空间特征的背景下，服务于什么目标？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The objective is to reveal the temporal and spatial features of land-use change, which lays the foundation for studying regional-scale land-use changes. This approach enables integrated studies of 'spatial pattern' and 'temporal process,' helping to understand the characteristics of regional land-use changes in terms of dynamic patterns and processes.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是揭示土地利用变化的时间和空间特征，为研究区域尺度的土地利用变化奠定基础。这种方法使得对“空间模式”和“时间过程”的综合研究成为可能，有助于理解区域土地利用变化在动态模式和过程方面的特征。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can a unified classification system be developed and employed to compare and evaluate different global land cover datasets effectively?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 如何开发和使用统一的分类系统，以有效比较和评估不同的全球土地覆盖数据集？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Developing a unified classification system involves reclassifying different land cover maps using a common legend system and validating these maps using a large-scale reference dataset, such as the 1:100 000 land cover map of China, to ensure consistency in evaluation.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 开发统一分类系统涉及使用共同的图例系统对不同的土地覆盖图进行重新分类，并利用大规模参考数据集（如1:100 000的中国土地覆盖图）对这些地图进行验证，以确保评估的一致性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What remote sensing technologies enable the collection of detailed land-use data in large-scale surveys?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些遥感技术能够在大规模调查中收集详细的土地利用数据？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The use of satellite remote sensing technologies such as Landsat MSS, TM, and ETM enables detailed collection of land-use data in large-scale surveys by providing high-resolution imagery that can be used to classify and monitor land cover over extensive areas.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 卫星遥感技术，如Landsat MSS、TM和ETM，能够通过提供高分辨率影像来详细收集大规模调查中的土地利用数据，这些影像可用于对广泛区域的土地覆盖进行分类和监测。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How does the integration of multiple remote sensing datasets enhance the accuracy of land cover classification over diverse geographical regions?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 多种遥感数据集的集成如何提高不同地理区域土地覆盖分类的准确性？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Integrating multiple remote sensing datasets, such as Landsat TM and CBERS-1 data, enhances the accuracy of land cover classification by compensating for limitations of individual datasets and providing a more comprehensive view of land-use changes across diverse geographical regions.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 整合多个遥感数据集，如Landsat TM和CBERS-1数据，可以提高土地覆盖分类的准确性，因为它弥补了单个数据集的局限性，并提供了对不同地理区域土地利用变化的更全面视角。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What challenges must be addressed to adapt classification systems for improved land cover mapping accuracy in land surface modeling?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 为了提高土地表面建模中土地覆盖映射的准确性，必须解决哪些挑战以适应分类系统？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Challenges include the need to unify different classification systems used by various datasets and to transfer existing classification systems to a well-recognized one suitable for land surface modeling, as differences in classification can hinder comparison and validation of datasets.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 挑战包括需要统一不同数据集使用的分类系统，以及将现有分类系统转移到适合地表建模的公认分类系统，因为分类差异可能会妨碍数据集的比较和验证。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What challenges might arise when integrating global land cover maps with differing classification systems for use in regional land-use studies?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在将具有不同分类系统的全球土地覆盖地图整合用于区域土地利用研究时，可能会出现哪些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The challenges include difficulty in comparison due to different classification systems, which affects the accuracy of the datasets for land surface modelling. There is a need to reclassify these maps using a unified legend system to make them compatible with reference data.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 挑战包括由于不同的分类系统导致比较困难，这影响了土地表面建模数据集的准确性。需要使用统一的图例系统对这些地图进行重新分类，以使其与参考数据兼容。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might the accuracy of land cover datasets not meet the requirements of land surface modelling, and what potential improvements could be explored?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么土地覆盖数据集的准确性可能无法满足地表建模的要求，可能探索哪些潜在的改进？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The accuracy may not meet requirements due to differences in classification systems and local labelling errors. Potential improvements could involve developing new land cover maps with compatible classification systems and higher accuracy, as well as reclassifying existing maps using a well-recognized legend system.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 由于分类系统和地方标记错误的差异，准确性可能无法满足要求。潜在的改进措施包括开发具有兼容分类系统和更高准确度的新土地覆盖图，以及使用公认的图例系统重新分类现有地图。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you evaluate the effectiveness of using remote sensing data, such as Landsat or CBERS-1, for capturing land-use changes over large geographic areas?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 您将如何评估使用遥感数据（如Landsat或CBERS-1）在大范围地理区域内捕捉土地利用变化的有效性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The use of remote sensing data like Landsat and CBERS-1 is considered effective for capturing land-use changes over large geographic areas. These datasets provide comprehensive coverage and have been instrumental in revealing regional land-use change characteristics. However, challenges such as classification system differences and accuracy issues in mapping methods need to be addressed to enhance reliability.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 使用遥感数据，如Landsat和CBERS-1，被认为是有效捕捉大范围地理区域土地利用变化的方法。这些数据集提供了全面的覆盖，并在揭示区域土地利用变化特征方面发挥了重要作用。然而，分类系统差异和制图方法的准确性问题等挑战需要解决，以提高可靠性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What are the perceived challenges when integrating various global land cover datasets, considering their differing classification systems and mapping methods?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在整合各种全球土地覆盖数据集时，考虑到它们不同的分类系统和制图方法，所面临的感知挑战有哪些？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The integration of various global land cover datasets is challenging due to differing classification systems and mapping methods. This makes direct comparison difficult, and the accuracies of datasets may not meet the rigorous requirements needed for specific applications like land surface modeling. A unified legend system and improved classification accuracy are needed to overcome these challenges.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 全球土地覆盖数据集的整合面临挑战，因为它们采用了不同的分类系统和制图方法。这使得直接比较变得困难，并且数据集的准确性可能无法满足特定应用（如地表建模）所需的严格要求。需要一个统一的图例系统和提高分类准确性，以克服这些挑战。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your opinion, what are the potential benefits and limitations of using a large-scale land use map as a reference for validating other land cover datasets?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在您看来，使用大规模土地利用地图作为验证其他土地覆盖数据集的参考的潜在好处和局限性是什么？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Using a large-scale land use map as a reference for validating other land cover datasets offers benefits such as providing a reliable standard for accuracy assessment. It helps identify discrepancies and validate the consistency of type areas in other datasets. However, converting its classification system to a widely recognized one can be challenging, and there might still be local labeling errors or inconsistencies in area representation.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 使用大规模土地利用地图作为验证其他土地覆盖数据集的参考，具有提供可靠准确性评估标准等好处。它有助于识别差异并验证其他数据集中类型区域的一致性。然而，将其分类系统转换为广泛认可的分类系统可能会面临挑战，并且仍可能存在地方标签错误或区域表示不一致的情况。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how land cover data can be reliably mapped using different classification systems across various large-scale datasets.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白如何能够使用不同的分类系统在各种大规模数据集中可靠地绘制土地覆盖数据。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The datasets mentioned used different classification systems, which made the comparison difficult. The objective was to evaluate these datasets over China by reclassifying them using a unified legend system and validating them against a large-scale reference map.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 提到的数据集使用了不同的分类系统，这使得比较变得困难。目标是通过使用统一的图例系统对这些数据集进行重新分类，并与大规模参考地图进行验证，以评估它们在中国的表现。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure about the specific challenges faced when integrating satellite remote sensing data for land-use change studies in China.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不确定在中国进行土地利用变化研究时，整合卫星遥感数据面临的具体挑战。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Challenges include the conspicuous conflicts between arable land protection and urban expansion, as well as the regional differentiation of land-use change, which affect the integration of land-use data.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 挑战包括耕地保护与城市扩张之间的明显冲突，以及土地利用变化的区域差异，这些都影响了土地利用数据的整合。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't figure out how the accuracy of different land cover datasets can meet the requirements of land surface modeling.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法弄清楚不同土地覆盖数据集的准确性如何满足土地表面建模的要求。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The accuracies of the datasets were found lacking for the requirements of land surface modeling. The classification system of the reference data needs to be transferred to a well-recognized one commonly used in land surface modeling to improve accuracy.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 数据集的准确性不足以满足地表建模的要求。参考数据的分类系统需要转移到一个在地表建模中常用的公认系统，以提高准确性。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please analyze the potential challenges in achieving a unified classification system for land cover datasets when integrating multiple data sources.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 分析在整合多个数据源时，实现统一土地覆盖数据集分类系统的潜在挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The challenges include the use of different classification systems across datasets, which complicates direct comparison and integration. This discrepancy makes it difficult to harmonize datasets for applications such as land surface modelling, as noted in the content of relevant papers. A well-recognized classification system is needed for a more consistent comparison.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 挑战包括不同数据集使用不同的分类系统，这使得直接比较和整合变得复杂。这种差异使得在土地表面建模等应用中难以协调数据集，相关论文中对此有所提及。需要一个公认的分类系统，以便进行更一致的比较。
